text: The High Cost of Health: Analyzing America's Healthcare Affordability Crisis" - a new report that highlights the struggles of everyday Americans to afford basic healthcare services. 🤕💸Did you know that the average person can only afford $97 in out-of-pocket medical costs per month? 😱 This means that many people are forced to skip or delay essential healthcare services like preventive visits, prescription drugs, mental health care, and diagnostic testing. 🤦‍♂️At PayZen, we understand the burden of healthcare costs and are committed to finding solutions using cutting-edge technology. 💻 Our AI-powered platform is designed to make healthcare more affordable and accessible for all Americans, leading to better patient outcomes and reduced financial stress for healthcare providers. 🏥💰It's time to address the elephant in the room: America's healthcare affordability crisis.
